name: LIITA3H App
description: The LIITA3H App is a mobile application to aid adolescence in making healthy diet choices.  It is developed under an STTR grant in collaboration with the University of Michigan.

settings.name: Mobile App Mode
settings.description: The mode the mobile app is in for collecting data and delivering content.

fields.doc: Name assigned to venue by participant.
fields.label: Venue Name
fields.name: name

fields.label: Trigger Type
fields.name: trig_type
fields.doc: The method used to detect arrival at the venue.
The ID of the a matched public venue, used for food recommendations.
fields.label: Matched Public Venue ID
fields.name: public_venue_id

fields.doc: Information used to trigger on arrival at venue
fields.label: Trigger Info
fields.name: trig_info

fields.doc: ID of the personal venue the record is for.
fields.label: Personal Venue ID
fields.name: venue_id

fields.doc: The type of training record this is.
fields.label: Type of Record
fields.name: record_type

fields.doc: The information for this record used to update the trigger info.
fields.label: Info
fields.name: info

fields.doc: The type of device capturing the info.  If a Smartphone, then the OS platform.
fields.label: Device Type
fields.name: device_type

fields.doc: Latitude in degrees.
fields.label: Latitude
fields.name: lat

fields.doc: Longitude in degrees.
fields.label: Longitude
fields.name: lon

fields.doc: Estimated accuracy of location, in meters
fields.label: Accuracy
fields.name: acc

fields.doc: Altitude if available, in meters above the WGS 84 reference ellipsoid.
fields.label: Altitude
fields.name: alt

fields.doc: The horizontal direction of travel of this device (not related to device orientation). If location does not have a bearing, then 0.0 is returned.
fields.label: Bearing
fields.name: bearing

fields.doc: Speed the device is traveling over ground. If location doesn't have a speed then 0.0 is returned.
fields.label: Speed
fields.name: speed

fields.doc: The name or type of the location system that provided the record.
fields.label: Provider
fields.name: provider

fields.doc: The time of the location record. Depending on device, this time could be different from when the record was logged.
fields.label: Location Time
fields.name: time

fields.doc: One of: error, warning, debug, or info.
fields.name: level
fields.label: Log level

fields.doc: A searchable string for event analytics.
fields.name: tag
fields.label: Tag

fields.doc: Human readable message.
fields.name: msg
fields.label: Message

fields.doc: An optional argument for analytics.
fields.name: arg0
fields.label: Argument 0

fields.doc: An second optional argument for analytics.
fields.name: arg1
fields.label: Argument 1

fields.doc: An optional stack trace for debugging.
fields.name: stack_trace
fields.label: Stack Trace
